alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 30 at 12:28AM AKDT until October 31 at 2:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches are expected along and near the Alaska Highway east of Dot Lake. * WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country. * WHEN...Until 2 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusting to 25 mph today along the Alaska Highway will cause areas of drifting snow and reduced visibility. Snow will taper off late Sunday night. No snow is expected north of Chicken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
